All dedicated to all beings, such great vows are never abandoned.
The bodhisattvas' vows and power are limitless and unobstructed, embracing all worlds,
Thus dedicating to all beings, never giving rise to a discriminating mind for even a moment.
May all beings be clear and bright, their giving and upholding of precepts completely pure,
Vigorously practicing without slacking off, such great vows without rest.

Their wisdom the same as the Honored One with Two Feet, discerning the true meaning and attaining the ultimate.

Speaking the Dharma in accord with principle without obstruction, yet their minds are unattached to it.
They always do not make duality in all dharmas, and also do not make non-duality,
Free from both duality and non-duality, knowing them all to be paths of language.
